additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 320 health, 1.6 health regen and 16 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 320 health and 1.6 health regen.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 320 health and 1.6 health regen.
Sange and its upgrades' Status Resistances don’t stack with each other.
Health regen amplification from multiple Sange-based items do not stack.
Lifesteal amplification from multiple Sange-based items do not stack.
name: Sange
description: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.
trivia: This item is named after Sange, a weapon from the Phantasy Star Online series.
Riki's cosmetic item, Sange the Backseeker, is based on Sange.
